PT. Handoko Semesta Madani

Founded in 2012 by Heryadi Purwanto Handoko, Sumitro. PT. HSM Cargo is dedicated to serving your needs with the quickest and most secure mode of product transportation, whether by air, land, or sea. Our staff is composed of the best members sourced from a diverse array of backgrounds, each with their own skillset and experiences of specialist training.

Managing projects and conducting logistics have been our primary experience and service for 11 years. Since then, our company has done end-to-end equipment transfer and product transportation services to serve our main customer base by arranging fluid paths and set scehdules from their workshops to appointed places.

We are proud to handle items, small and large, as a business in the industry of power, oil and gas, mining and metallurgy, construction materials, manufacturing, and the military industry.

Get to Know Us →

Land

We have founded our own private fleet of land-based transportation equipped with the best staff and gear to ensure top-quality and secure product deliveries - just for you.

Learn more

Air

Our services includes delivery by air.
We charter and maintain a partnership with various airlines across Indonesia. With this method, we assure you for a swift delivery at a global scale.

Learn more

Maritime

We have joined a guild or entity of representative with other companies, both cargo offices and shipping, to ensure the rapid transportation of products en-masse in blue waters.

Learn more
